name: [BF] sum
description:
Given a string (terminated with `\0`), output the sum of all of its codepoints.

You can assume that the resulting sum will always fit within a byte.

## Examples
```
sum('\0') -> '\0'
sum('\x01\0') -> '\x01'
sum('\x03\x01\x02\0') -> '\x06'

```

---

(P.S. I've removed the cumbersome requirements in my previous version to make it easier for beginners.)
